Text.Name: single_jin
Text.Desc: Increase the metal element in the environment and the breakthrought rate of metal laws.

Text.Name: single_mu
Text.Desc: Increase the wood element in the environment and the breakthrought rate of wood laws.

Text.Name: single_shui
Text.Desc: Increase the water element in the environment and the breakthrought rate of water laws.

Text.Name: single_huo
Text.Desc: Increase the fire element in the environment and the breakthrought rate of fire laws.

Text.Name: single_tu
Text.Desc: Increase the earth element in the environment and the breakthrought rate of earth laws.

Text.Name: jin_mu
Text.Desc: Significantly increase the lumber and collection speed of disciples.

Text.Name: jin_shui
Text.Desc: Significantly increase the artisanry and sewing speed of disciples.

Text.Name: jin_huo
Text.Desc: Significantly increase the mine yield of disciples.

Text.Name: jin_tu
Text.Desc: Significantly increase the mine gain of disciples.

Text.Name: mu_shui
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the yield of sect disciples and the fertility of the sect's map

Text.Name: mu_huo
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the forging and cooking speed of sect disciples

Text.Name: mu_tu
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the construction speed of sect disciples

Text.Name: shui_huo
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the disaster relief speed and success rate of sect disciples.

Text.Name: shui_tu
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the expected healing effects and natural recovery of sect disciples

Text.Name: huo_tu
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the demolition speed and stonework speed of sect disciples

Text.Name: jin_mu_shui
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the wood law matching of sect disciples

Text.Name: jin_mu_huo
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the alchemy yield of sect disciples

Text.Name: jin_mu_tu
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the cultivation speed, foundation building speed, and mental state value of sect disciples

Text.Name: jin_shui_huo
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the artifact refinement success rate of sect disciples

Text.Name: jin_shui_tu
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the water law matching of sect disciples

Text.Name: jin_huo_tu
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the metal law matching of sect disciples

Text.Name: mu_shui_huo
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the fire law matching of sect disciples

Text.Name: mu_shui_tu
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the alchemy speed of sect disciples

Text.Name: mu_huo_tu
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the earth law matching of sect disciples

Text.Name: shui_huo_tu
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the artifact forging speed of sect disciples

Text.Name: no_jin
Text.Desc: Increase the Metal damage reduction.(global)

Text.Name: no_mu
Text.Desc: Increase Wood damage reduction.(global)

Text.Name: no_shui
Text.Desc: Increase Water damage reduction.(global)

Text.Name: no_huo
Text.Desc: Increase Fire damage reduction.(global)

Text.Name: no_tu
Text.Desc: Increase Earth attribute damage reduction.(global)

Text.Name: hunyuan
Text.Desc: Decrease attainment, increase learning speed.
